gametools

Enum Graphic.UpdateType

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Graphic.UpdateType>
      • gametools.Graphic.UpdateType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Graphic.UpdateType>
    Enclosing class:
    Graphic

    public static enum Graphic.UpdateType
extends java.lang.Enum<Graphic.UpdateType>
    The different ways of drawing the object.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      DRAW_ONLY
      Only draws the object.
      NONE
      Does not update the object or draw it.
      UPDATE_DRAW
      First updates the object, and then draws it.
      UPDATE_ONLY
      Only updates the object.
